nodes.text: Lunavolver Delta was a cylindrical space station that orbited the planet Fondor. It was a major spaceport containing 360 starship hangars. It rotated along the axis of its cylinder for gravity and even sunlight distribution. The Republic Sienar Systems Diplomatic Headquarters was located on Lunavolver Delta. Senator Rodd maintained an office there as well, for he headed the diplomatic agency.

Jango Fett and Cradossk of the Bounty Hunters Guild met on Lunavolver Delta on joint assignments to kill Senator Rodd and two of his associates. The Slave I and Merciless Captivator were temporarily docked in the station's hangars.
